basics.name: Samuel Oyegbemi
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Passionate software engineer with over 8 years of technical experience in building quality and reliable software solutions. Have the privilege of leading a technical team, ensuring best practices and effective collaboration. Currently looking out for opportunities to employ my skills in crafting software to meet business needs.

work.name: eBanqo Inc.
highlights: Contribute to core backend services
Manage a team of two engineers
Review of pull requests raised by teammates
Create technical requirement documents and architectural designs for new features
Work with teammates to implement features

Work with teammates to implement features

projects.name: Munchmate
projects.description: A food delivery app based in Nigeria
highlights: The API is designed as microservices, developed using Node.js and MongoDB
The Mobile app is developed with Flutter

projects.name: MVM Hyper
projects.description: A play to earn gaming platform where individuals can play practice games for fun or play p2p for reward
highlights: The API is designed as microservices, developed using Node.js, MySQL and MongoDB
The Mobile app is developed with Flutter

projects.name: SMEShop
projects.description: A learning management system and consultancy platform for Small and Medium scale Enterprise

projects.name: BSchoolAfrica
projects.description: Learning management system customized from SMEShop
